import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";// appApi
import appApi from"../services/appApi";var initialState=[];export var productSlice=createSlice({name:"products",initialState:initialState,reducers:{updateProducts:function updateProducts(_,action){return action.payload;}},extraReducers:function extraReducers(builder){builder.addMatcher(appApi.endpoints.createProduct.matchFulfilled,function(_,_ref){var payload=_ref.payload;return payload;});builder.addMatcher(appApi.endpoints.updateProduct.matchFulfilled,function(_,_ref2){var payload=_ref2.payload;return payload;});builder.addMatcher(appApi.endpoints.deleteProduct.matchFulfilled,function(_,_ref3){var payload=_ref3.payload;return payload;});}});var updateProducts=productSlice.actions.updateProducts;export{updateProducts};export default productSlice.reducer;
